entries.title: Health Canada Pursues Enhancements to COVID Vaccine Passport, Raises Link to Digital ID
entries.description: The Quebec government’s vaccine passport, called VaxiCode, is shown on a phone in Montreal on Aug. 25, 2021. (The Canadian Press/Graham Hughes)

entries.title: Spotify Shares Jump on Bullish Outlook as More Users Tune In
entries.description: The Spotify logo is displayed on a screen on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange, on May 3, 2018. (Brendan McDermid/Reuters)

entries.title: Elon Musk Testified It’s ‘Easy’ for Him to Get Investment Support
entries.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk departs the company’s local office in Washington, on Jan. 27, 2023.  (Jonathan Ernst/Reuters)

entries.title: New Artificial Intelligence App ‘Reframes’ Negative Thoughts to Treat Depression
entries.description: Undated file photo showing a woman sitting on a bench. (PA)

entries.title: After Tesla Price Cut, Ford Follows Suit With Mustang Mach-E
entries.description: An 2022 Ford Mustang Mach E whips past the State Capitol as the legislative session opens in the House of Representatives in the Senate chambers in Denver on Jan. 9, 2023. (David Zalubowski/AP Photo)
